subject: [Mhln] Confirmation link
body:
Thank you for your loan request, which we recieved 
yesterday. We'd like to inform you that we are accepting your application.We 
are ready to give you a $272,000 loan (Approved refinance) for a low month 
payment. Approval process will take only 1 minute. Please visit the confirmation 
link below and fill-out our short 30 second form. http://geocities.com/DeptCass7023
